name: UnsuspendGithubUser
description:
Unsuspend a user on GitHub Enterprise.

This tool unsuspends a user on a GitHub Enterprise instance. It is disabled if the GitHub instance uses LDAP Sync with Active Directory LDAP servers, in which case it returns a `403` response. It should be called to restore access to a suspended user.

parameters.name: github_user_handle
parameters.description: The GitHub user handle to identify the user account to unsuspend.

value_schema.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

parameters.name: unsuspension_reason
parameters.description: The reason for unsuspending the user, logged in the audit log. Defaults to "Unsuspended via API by _SITE_ADMINISTRATOR_" if not provided.

value_schema.description: The reason the user is being unsuspended. This message will be logged in the [audit log](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/admin/monitoring-activity-in-your-enterprise/reviewing-audit-logs-for-your-enterprise/about-the-audit-log-for-your-enterprise). If you don't provide a `reason`, it will default to "Unsuspended via API by _SITE\_ADMINISTRATOR_", where _SITE\_ADMINISTRATOR_ is the person who performed the action.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

value_schema.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The reason the user is being unsuspended. This message will be logged in the [audit log](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/admin/monitoring-activity-in-your-enterprise/reviewing-audit-logs-for-your-enterprise/about-the-audit-log-for-your-enterprise). If you don't provide a `reason`, it will default to "Unsuspended via API by _SITE\_ADMINISTRATOR_", where _SITE\_ADMINISTRATOR_ is the person who performed the action.

value_schema.description: The reason the user is being unsuspended. This message will be logged in the [audit log](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/admin/monitoring-activity-in-your-enterprise/reviewing-audit-logs-for-your-enterprise/about-the-audit-log-for-your-enterprise). If you don't provide a `reason`, it will default to "Unsuspended via API by _SITE\_ADMINISTRATOR_", where _SITE\_ADMINISTRATOR_ is the person who performed the action.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
